greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of Sum_{n>=0} n*q^(n^2).
comment: Multiplicative with a(p^(2e)) = p^e, a(p^(2e+1)) = 0. - _Mitch Harris_, Jun 09 2005
a(n) is the square root of n if n is square, zero otherwise. - _Carl R. White_, May 23 2009
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
formula: Dirichlet generating function: zeta(2*s-1). - _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Sep 11 2005.
a(n) = sqrt(n) * floor( cos^2(Pi * sqrt(n)) ). - _Carl R. White_, May 23 2009
program: a037213 n = if n == r ^ 2 then r else 0  where r = a000196 n
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
